entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:29 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
